casebody.data:
December 8, 1947.

Per Curiam Decisions.

No. 413. Hazel Park Non-Partisan Taxpayers Association et al. v. Township of Royal Oak et al.; and City of Ferndale v. Hazel Park Non-Partisan Taxpayers Association et al. No. 424. Stanton G. Dondero for appellants in No. 413. Orph C. Holmes and Claude H. Stevens for appellant in No. 424. Glenn C. Gillespie and William C. Hudson for Royal Oak, *833appellee in Nos. 413 and 424. Lee E. Joslyn, Jr. and Selden S. Dickinson for Whitcomb et al., appellees in Nos. 413 and 424. *832 Per Curiam:

The motions to dismiss are granted and the appeals are dismissed for want of a substantial federal question.
